          <title>
            <string language="en">Fast-moving cyclist trying to avoid a car</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sich schnell bewegender Radfahrer, der versucht, 
ein Auto zu vermeiden</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cycliste rapide essayant d'éviter une voiture</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cyclist fast-moving que tenta evitar um carro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cyclist rapido che prova a evitare un automobile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γρήγορος ποδηλάτης που προσπαθεί να αποφύγει ένα 
αυτοκίνητο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cyclist rápido que intenta evitar un coche</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the direction of the velocity and acceleration of a cyclist slowing down to avoid hitting a car.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">car</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cyclist</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">deceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">velocity</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Richtung der 
Geschwindigkeit und der Beschleunigung eines Radfahrers, der 
verlangsamt, um ein, Auto zu schlagen zu vermeiden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la direction de la 
vitesse et de l'accélération d'un cycliste ralentissant pour éviter
de heurter une voiture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o sentido da velocidade 
e do acceleration de um cyclist que retarda para baixo para evitar de 
bater um carro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il senso della 
velocità e dell'accelerazione di un cyclist che rallenta per evitare 
di colpire un automobile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την κατεύθυνση της 
ταχύτητας και ταχύτητα ενός ποδηλάτη που επιβραδύνει για να 
αποφύγει ένα αυτοκίνητο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la dirección de la 
velocidad y de la aceleración de un cyclist que retrasa para evitar 
de golpear un coche.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radfahrer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
